title: Regional Sales Leader, France & Benelux
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products—they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionised entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts.
description: As a people leader, you will be expected to build, develop, coach and lead experienced sales teams across multiple countries through organising, motivating, and enabling them with the right tools and with real-time feedback. Inspire your team’s collaboration and develop a diverse and inclusive environment...
key_qualifications: 10+ years of international experience leading regional sales organizations. Expert in working cross-functionally and influencing key stakeholders. Ability to manage complex markets...
preferred_qualifications: Significant previous experience in a Consumer Electronics device, FMCG or other related industries. Successful experience of partnering with Retailers, Carriers and Enterprise businesses. Will have significant previous experience operating and influencing within a multinational organization.
